info.title: Fitness API
info.description: A comprehensive fitness tracking and coaching API that allows coaches to manage trainees, create workout and nutrition plans, and track progress.

userId.description: User ID for coach to specify which user

order.description: Order of exercise in the workout

day.description: Day number in the workout plan

isRestDay.description: Whether this is a rest day

exercises.description: List of exercises for this day

name.description: Updated name of the workout plan

description.description: Updated description of the workout plan

isActive.description: Whether the workout plan is active

time.description: Time when meal should be consumed

foods.description: List of foods in this meal

meals.description: List of meals for this day

name.description: Updated name of the nutrition plan

description.description: Updated description of the nutrition plan

isActive.description: Whether the nutrition plan is active

coachId.description: ID of the coach to connect with

type.description: Type of connection requests to retrieve

logType.description: Type of logging for this exercise

workoutPlanDayExerciseId.description: ID of the workout plan day exercise

userWorkoutPlanId.description: ID of the user workout plan

userId.description: ID of the user to assign the plan to

startDate.description: Start date for the nutrition plan

endDate.description: End date for the nutrition plan

date.description: Date when the meal was completed (YYYY-MM-DD format, defaults to current date). Only the date part is used for adherence tracking.

get.description: Simple health check that returns pong

Get all body measurement statistics for the current user

Get all nutrition plans assigned to the current user

Update a nutrition plan with all its days, meals, foods in one request. Items not included will be deleted.
